description.tableOfContents: Display a table of contents for the article.
description.tableOfContentsTitle: Title of the table of contents.
description.compressSections: Compress sections to show only the title, and a part of the content (with expand button).
description.compressSectionsExpandLabel: Text for the expand button when sections are compressed.
description.compressSectionsMinimizedLabel: Text for the minimize button when sections are expanded.
